japanese:
く……。
俺としたことが、あんな場所で寝てしまうとは。
translation:
Ugh...
I can't believe I fell asleep in a place like that.

japanese:
仕方ないよ。
それだけ疲れてたってことだし。
translation:
It can't be helped.
That's just how tired you were.

japanese: 気づいた時点で起こしてくれよ……。
translation: You should have woken me up when you noticed...

japanese:
起こすなんてできませんよ。
それに、可愛い寝顔でしたよ？
translation:
I couldn't do something like that.
Also, your face is so cute when you're sleeping,
you know?

japanese: ぬぐっ……。
translation: Ugghh...

japanese: そんなに見られるのが嫌なのですか？
translation: Do you dislike being watched that much?

japanese:
当たり前だ！
誰だって好きじゃないだろ、寝顔を見られるなんて！
translation:
Of course!
No one likes being watched while they're sleeping!

japanese:
あーあ、写真撮りたかったわ。
こういうときに限って
スマホを持ってきてないなんて不覚よ。
translation:
Aaah, I wanted to take a picture so bad.
It's a shame I didn't bring my phone.

japanese: 俺からすれば、むしろ助かった。
translation: For my part, that's a relief.

japanese:
てか、お前の場合、寝顔なんて何度か見てるだろ。
家から追い出そうとしたときとか。
translation:
But like, you, Nino,
you've seen me sleeping countless times, right?
Like when you were about to kick me out that time.

japanese:
……私は過去を振り返らない女なの。
それに、昔と今じゃ事情も違うのよ。
translation:
...I'm not a girl who looks back on the past.
Then is not the same thing as now.

japanese:
あ、そうだわ。
ねえ、らいはちゃん。
お兄ちゃんの寝顔の写真とか、持ってないかしら？
translation:
Ah, that's right.
Hey, Raiha-chan.
Do you have any pictures of your brother sleeping?

japanese:
どうだったかな？
探してみればあるかもしれない。
translation:
I wonder.
If I look, I might be able to find some.

japanese:
やめろ！
らいはも、そんなもの探さんでいいからな！？
translation:
Stop it!
You don't need to look for anything like that,
okay, Raiha!

japanese:
くそ、こうなるから嫌なんだよ。
寝顔とか無防備な姿を晒すのは……。
translation:
Damn, this is why I hate this sort of thing.
Exposing vulnerable moments
like when someone is sleeping...

japanese:
でも、私は嬉しかった。
フータローが、それだけ私たちに
気を許してくれてるってことだから。
translation:
But, I was happy.
It means that you trust us enough
to be that relaxed, Futaro.

japanese: ……写真は私もほしかったけど。
translation: ...Although I wanted a picture too.

japanese: お前もか！！
translation: You too, huh!!

japanese:
実はこっそり撮ってました、なんて、
これは口が裂けても言えないなー……。
translation:
Well, even if you took a sneaky picture
of someone sleeping,
there's no way anyone would ever admit it...

japanese: 一花？　何か？
translation: What? Ichika?

japanese:
ううん、なんでもなーい。
ホント写真撮りたかったねー。
translation:
Oh, nothing!
I really wanted to take a picture, that's all!

japanese:
あと、念のために聞いておくが、
俺の体に変なことしてないだろうな？
顔に落書きとか。
translation:
And just to be sure,
you didn't do anything weird to my body, did you?
Drawing on my face, for example.

japanese:
してないから安心して。
そもそもペンなんて持ってないし。
translation:
No, don't worry.
Besides, I don't even have a pen with on me.

japanese:
いや、１人、前科があるやつがいるからな？
なあ二乃？
translation:
Well, there's someone here
that has been known to do something like that.
Right, Nino?

japanese:
何度も言わせないで。
私は過去を振り返らない女よ。
translation:
Don't make me say it again.
I'm a girl who doesn't look back on the past.

japanese:
むしろ、私を疑うよりも
横にいる三玖を警戒したほうがいいわよ？
こっそり膝枕をしようとしてたもの。
translation:
Actually, you should be more wary
of Miku next to you, you know?
She was secretly trying to lay your head in her lap.

japanese: に、二乃っ！？
translation: N-Nino?!

japanese:
ご、ご、ごめん、フータロー！
その、いたずらするつもりは全然なくて！
translation:
S-s-sorry, Futaro!
I wasn't planning on doing anything mischievous, really!

japanese:
そんなに必死になることねーよ。
まあ……本当にされてたら困るが。
translation:
You're making too big a deal out of it.
Well actually...it would've been a problem
if you actually went through with it though.

japanese: ……そうか、さすがに疑いすぎか。
translation: ...I guess I'm being too suspicious of everyone, huh.

japanese:
そんなこと言ってるけど、
こっそり膝枕をしようとしてたのは
どこの誰だったかしら？
translation:
You say that,
but I wonder if there was a certain someone
who was trying to get you to lay your head on their lap?

japanese: に、二乃っ！？
translation: N-Nino?!

japanese:
ご、ご、ごめん、フータロー！
その、いたずらするつもりは全然なくて！
translation:
S-s-sorry, Futaro!
I wasn't planning on doing anything mischievous, really!

japanese:
そんなに必死になることねーよ。
まあ……本当にされてたら困るが。
translation:
You're making too big a deal out of it.
Well actually...it would've been a problem
if you actually went through with it though.

japanese:
なんだかんだ言って、男の子にとっては夢だもんね。
女の子の膝枕って。
translation:
With all that said though, isn't it a dream for boys
to be able to rest their head on a girl's lap?

japanese: 勝手に夢にするな！！
translation: Don't assume that's a dream of mine!!

japanese: あれ？　今の……。
translation: Hm? Just now...

japanese: さっきの青い鳥の声だよね？
translation: The song of that bluebird from before?

japanese: ああ、あそこにいますね。
translation: Yeah, it's over there, isn't it.

japanese: もしかして、私たちのことを追いかけてきた？
translation: Could it perhaps be following us?

japanese:
それはないでしょ。
いくら人懐っこくても野生の鳥が……。
translation:
That's impossible.
Even if it's friendly, it's still a wild bird...

japanese: いや、どうやら本当についてきてるみたいだぞ。
translation: No, it seems like it really is following us.

japanese: 私たちの上をぐるぐる飛んでる！
translation: It's flying around us in circles!

japanese:
んんー？
心なしか三玖のことを追いかけてるような……。
translation:
Hmm?
It seems like
the bird seems to be chasing after Miku...

japanese:
まさか、三玖のクッキーが気に入ったから
ついてきたんですか？
translation: Could it be because it liked Miku's cookies so much?

japanese:
恐るべし、三玖のクッキー！
これはマジシャンじゃなくて
クッキー職人になるべきかも！
translation:
Miku's cookies are something ELSE!
Miku should consider becoming a cookie artisan
rather than a magician!

japanese:
そ、そんなに言うほど、
いいものじゃないと思うけど……。
translation:
I-I don't think they're good enough
to warrant that sort of praise...

japanese:
どうするの？
このままじゃ別荘までついてきそうだけど。
translation:
What should we do?
It's going to follow us back to the villa at this rate.

japanese:
今のところ害はないし、
自由にさせておけばいいんじゃないか？
三玖はどうだ、嫌なら追い払うぞ。
translation:
For now, it's not causing us any harm.
Why don't we just leave it be and let it do as it pleases?
Whatcha think? If you don't like it, I can shoo it away.

japanese:
ううん、私もいい。
怖い鳥じゃないし、可愛いし。
translation:
No, I'm fine with it.
It's not a scary bird. It's cute.

japanese:
青い鳥に気に入られるなんて、
やっぱり三玖、いいことあるんじゃないかな？
translation:
Being liked by a bluebird,
I really have a feeling something good
is going to happen to you, Miku.

japanese: うん……。
translation: Yeah...

japanese: ……幸せ、か。
translation: ...Happiness, huh.
